property.name: db.ignore.external.links
property.description: If true, outlinks leading from a page to external hosts will be ignored. This is an effective way to limit the crawl to include only initially injected hosts, without creating complex URLFilters.

property.name: elastic.host
property.description: The hostname to send documents to using TransportClient. Either host and port must be defined or cluster.

property.name: elastic.port
property.description: The port to connect to using TransportClient.

property.name: elastic.cluster
property.description: The cluster name to discover. Either host and potr must be defined or cluster.

property.name: elastic.index
property.description: The name of the elasticsearch index. Will normally be autocreated if it doesn't exist.
